leather cap.name: Leather Cap
leather cap.description: A cap made of leather. It's not very protective, but it's better than nothing.

snapback cap.name: Snapback Cap
snapback cap.description: A stylish cap with a flat brim and an adjustable snap closure. It adds a touch of urban flair to your outfit while offering minimal protection from the sun.

beanie.name: Beanie
beanie.description: A cozy knit hat that hugs your head and keeps you warm during chilly days. It's a fashionable accessory that complements your casual attire.

bucket hat.name: Bucket Hat
bucket hat.description: A wide-brimmed hat with a relaxed and laid-back vibe. Perfect for shielding your face from the sun while enjoying outdoor activities or simply adding a touch of '90s nostalgia to your look.

baseball cap.name: Baseball Cap
baseball cap.description: A classic cap inspired by the sport of baseball. It features a curved brim and an adjustable strap at the back. Great for completing a casual and sporty ensemble.

trucker hat.name: Trucker Hat
trucker hat.description: A retro-style hat with a mesh back and a foam front panel. The unique design and breathable mesh make it a trendy choice for outdoor adventures or adding a touch of urban style to your outfit.

tactical helmet.name: Tactical Helmet
tactical helmet.description: A rugged helmet designed for tactical operations. It provides enhanced protection with a sturdy build, padding, and a mount for attaching accessories like a headlamp or camera. Ideal for adventurers who prioritize safety and functionality.

cyber visor.name: Cyber Visor
cyber visor.description: A futuristic visor with augmented reality capabilities. It overlays digital information onto the wearer's field of view, enhancing perception and granting access to various digital functionalities. A stylish choice for tech-savvy individuals.

steampunk top hat.name: Steampunk Top Hat
steampunk top hat.description: An extravagant top hat inspired by steampunk aesthetics. It features intricate gears, goggles, and ornate decorations. Aside from its fashionable appeal, it provides moderate protection against physical and elemental threats.

denim jacket.name: Denim Jacket
denim jacket.description: A classic denim jacket that never goes out of style. It adds a touch of rugged charm to your outfit while offering some protection against the elements. The faded patches and worn edges tell stories of adventures past, making you feel like a seasoned traveler.

hooded sweatshirt.name: Hooded Sweatshirt
hooded sweatshirt.description: A cozy hooded sweatshirt that wraps you in warmth and comfort. Its soft fabric and relaxed fit make it perfect for casual outings or lazy days. The hood provides a sense of privacy and anonymity, allowing you to retreat into your own world when needed.

flannel shirt.name: Flannel Shirt
flannel shirt.description: A timeless flannel shirt that exudes a laid-back, rustic charm. Its plaid pattern and soft texture make it a versatile piece of clothing suitable for various occasions. Whether you're chopping wood or meeting friends at a local pub, this shirt is a reliable companion that combines style and comfort.

graphic t-shirt.name: Graphic T-Shirt
graphic t-shirt.description: A stylish and comfortable cotton t-shirt featuring a vibrant graphic design. It showcases your personal interests or sense of humor, making it a conversation starter. Perfect for expressing your individuality and adding a pop of color to your outfit.

varsity jacket.name: Varsity Jacket
varsity jacket.description: A retro-inspired varsity jacket that brings back memories of high school and college days. Made with a combination of wool and leather accents, it gives off a sporty and nostalgic vibe. The team patches or logos on the jacket make you feel part of a special group, evoking a sense of camaraderie.

button-up shirt.name: Button-Up Shirt
button-up shirt.description: A classic button-up shirt that strikes the perfect balance between smart and casual. Made from breathable fabric, it offers a polished and put-together look. Suitable for various occasions, whether it's a casual day at the office or a night out with friends.

bomber jacket.name: Bomber Jacket
bomber jacket.description: A trendy bomber jacket that adds a touch of urban style to your outfit. Made from lightweight materials, it provides a comfortable fit while offering mild protection against the elements. The ribbed cuffs and collar give it a distinctive look that's both fashionable and practical.

plaid flannel shirt.name: Plaid Flannel Shirt
plaid flannel shirt.description: A cozy and casual flannel shirt featuring a classic plaid pattern. Made with soft, brushed cotton fabric, it's perfect for cooler days and adds a rustic charm to your ensemble. Whether you're spending a weekend in the countryside or running errands in the city, this shirt offers both comfort and style.

hooded cardigan.name: Hooded Cardigan
hooded cardigan.description: A versatile hooded cardigan that combines the comfort of a sweater with the practicality of a hood. Made from a blend of warm and soft materials, it's perfect for layering during transitional seasons. Whether you're lounging at home or enjoying a stroll in the park, this cardigan provides a cozy and relaxed look.

leather pants.name: Leather Pants
leather pants.description: Pants made of leather. They're not very protective, but they're better than nothing.

denim jeans.name: Denim Jeans
denim jeans.description: A classic pair of jeans made from durable denim fabric. Stylish and versatile, offering moderate protection and freedom of movement for urban adventures.

tactical pants.name: Tactical Pants
tactical pants.description: Sturdy and functional pants designed for tactical missions. They feature reinforced knees, multiple pockets, and adjustable straps for carrying equipment. Ideal for those who value both style and practicality.

cyber leggings.name: Cyber Leggings
cyber leggings.description: Futuristic leggings made of advanced synthetic materials. They offer enhanced mobility and protection with a sleek, cybernetic design. Perfect for tech enthusiasts and urban explorers.

steampunk trousers.name: Steampunk Trousers
steampunk trousers.description: Elaborate trousers inspired by steampunk fashion. They feature intricate gears, leather accents, and adjustable buckles. Not only do they provide moderate protection, but they also make a bold fashion statement.

combat leggings.name: Combat Leggings
combat leggings.description: Specially designed leggings for combat situations. Made from a combination of flexible fabric and reinforced plates, these leggings provide excellent mobility and reliable protection during intense battles.

magic robes.name: Magic Robes
magic robes.description: Flowing robes imbued with magical properties. While not heavily protective, they enhance the wearer's magical abilities and grant resistance against certain elemental forces. A favored choice among spellcasters and mystics.

leather boots.name: Leather Boots
leather boots.description: Sturdy boots made of genuine leather. They provide basic protection for your paws while offering durability and a comfortable fit.

canvas sneakers.name: Canvas Sneakers
canvas sneakers.description: Lightweight sneakers with a canvas upper. They're perfect for casual outings, allowing your paws to breathe with their breathable texture.

hiking boots.name: Hiking Boots
hiking boots.description: Sturdy boots with excellent grip and ankle support, perfect for hiking adventures. Their rugged soles and water-resistant texture keep your paws protected and dry.

running shoes.name: Running Shoes
running shoes.description: Sleek and lightweight shoes designed for running and agility. Their flexible construction and breathable fabric help prevent your paws from getting sweaty during intense activities.

steel-toed boots.name: Steel-Toed Boots
steel-toed boots.description: Heavy-duty boots with reinforced steel toes for maximum protection. These boots are ideal for hazardous environments and provide exceptional durability and impact resistance for your paws.

slip-on sandals.name: Slip-On Sandals
slip-on sandals.description: Comfortable sandals with an open-toe design. Easy to slip on and off, they allow your paws to breathe and stay cool on warm days.

leather gloves.name: Leather Gloves
leather gloves.description: Sturdy gloves made of genuine leather. They provide basic protection for your paws while allowing flexibility and a comfortable grip.

knitted fingerless gloves.name: Knitted Fingerless Gloves
knitted fingerless gloves.description: Cozy fingerless gloves knitted with soft yarn. These gloves keep your paws warm while allowing dexterity for delicate tasks.

tactical gloves.name: Tactical Gloves
tactical gloves.description: Durable gloves designed for tactical operations. They offer extra protection for your paws with reinforced materials and a textured grip for optimal control.

climbing gloves.name: Climbing Gloves
climbing gloves.description: Specialized gloves for climbing adventures. Their textured palms and flexible construction provide a secure grip and protect your paws from rough surfaces.

magic-infused gauntlets.name: Magic-Infused Gauntlets
magic-infused gauntlets.description: Gauntlets imbued with magical properties. They enhance your paw's natural dexterity and grant a boost to your magical abilities. A perfect choice for spellcasters seeking both style and functionality.

archery gloves.name: Archery Gloves
archery gloves.description: Gloves specifically designed for archers. They offer a smooth texture and a secure fit to ensure precision and comfort when drawing a bowstring, keeping your paws nimble and sweat-free.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: A small and lightweight weapon with a sharp blade. Perfect for quick and stealthy attacks, allowing your character to strike with precision and agility.

shortsword.name: Shortsword
shortsword.description: A versatile one-handed sword with a balanced design. It offers a good mix of speed and power, making it suitable for various combat situations.

hand axe.name: Hand Axe
hand axe.description: A compact axe designed for one-handed use. It's ideal for both chopping wood and delivering swift strikes in close combat.

rapier.name: Rapier
rapier.description: A slender and elegant sword with a sharp point. The rapier is known for its agility and precision, making it a favorite among fencers and duelists.

greatsword.name: Greatsword
greatsword.description: A massive and imposing sword that requires two hands to wield. Its size and weight provide immense power, capable of delivering devastating strikes to opponents.

battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
battleaxe.description: A heavy and formidable axe designed for both cutting and smashing. It requires two hands to wield effectively, making it a fearsome weapon on the battlefield.

warhammer.name: Warhammer
warhammer.description: A powerful blunt weapon designed to crush and pulverize. The warhammer's weight and blunt force make it effective against armored foes and heavily fortified structures.

shortbow.name: Shortbow
shortbow.description: A compact and versatile bow designed for quick and precise ranged attacks. It allows your character to attack from a distance while maintaining mobility.

crossbow.name: Crossbow
crossbow.description: A ranged weapon that uses a mechanical mechanism to launch bolts with increased force. The crossbow delivers powerful and accurate shots, making it a deadly choice for ranged combat.

throwing knives.name: Throwing Knives
throwing knives.description: A set of lightweight knives designed for throwing. They are balanced and deadly in the hands of a skilled character, allowing for precise and stealthy ranged attacks.

weight gain potion.name: Weight Gain Potion
weight gain potion.description: A potion that makes you gain weight. [red]WARNING: this potion is very potent and might influence how people react at your new weight[/red]

lust potion.name: Lust Potion
lust potion.description: A potion that makes you horny

memory enhancement potion.name: Memory Enhancement Potion
memory enhancement potion.description: This sparkling concoction is favored by scholars and sages. Once consumed, it enhances the drinker's memory, making recall quicker and more accurate. [red]WARNING: Overuse may lead to incessant recollection of even the most trivial details[/red]

strength potion.name: Strength Potion
strength potion.description: A potent brew with a fiery aftertaste, this potion bestows upon the drinker an impressive increase in physical strength. [red]WARNING: Aftereffects may include uncontrolled outbursts of power[/red]

charm potion.name: Charm Potion
charm potion.description: A sweet and fragrant elixir that imbues the drinker with an irresistible charisma. [red]WARNING: Prolonged use can lead to unwanted attention and attraction[/red]

night vision potion.name: Night Vision Potion
night vision potion.description: A potion that transforms the user's sight to pierce the darkness, useful for nocturnal activities. [red]WARNING: May cause temporary light sensitivity upon returning to bright areas[/red]

speed potion.name: Speed Potion
speed potion.description: An electrifying brew that enhances the drinker's speed to supernatural levels. [red]WARNING: Disorientation and dizziness may occur from rapid movement[/red]

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: A red apple. It's not very filling, but it's better than nothing.

bread.name: Bread
bread.description: A loaf of bread. It's not very filling, but it's better than nothing.

burger.name: Burger
burger.description: A burger. It's not very filling, but it's better than nothing.

cheese.name: Cheese
cheese.description: A wedge of robust, creamy cheese. Satisfying and packed with nutrients, it's the ideal snack for a hearty appetite.

chicken leg.name: Chicken Leg
chicken leg.description: A roasted chicken leg, well-seasoned and cooked to perfection. It's a hearty meal that leaves you wanting more.

steak.name: Steak
steak.description: A generously cut steak, grilled to your preference. Its juicy, tender mouthfeel is a true delight to carnivores.

salad.name: Salad
salad.description: A fresh garden salad, a light and refreshing meal. While it doesn't add much weight, it keeps hunger at bay.

pizza slice.name: Pizza Slice
pizza slice.description: A slice of pizza topped with melty cheese and a variety of toppings. While not the healthiest choice, it's incredibly satisfying.

book.name: Book
book.description: An old, leather-bound book filled with tales of ancient heroes. Perfect for a quiet night in.

compass.name: Compass
compass.description: A small, brass compass. Essential for those who wish to travel uncharted territories.

candle.name: Candle
candle.description: A simple, wax candle. Provides light in the darkest of nights.

map.name: Map
map.description: A detailed map of the local area. For the adventurous soul, this is a must-have.

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.description: A set of lockpicking tools. Handy in a pinch and ideal for those with a knack for unlocking secrets.

lantern.name: Lantern
lantern.description: A sturdy, oil lantern. It provides a steady light source, perfect for exploring dark caves or nighttime journeys.
